gen:link.label:label: BV310_2: The item "Catastrophe Risk Charge after risk mitigation" reported in SR.27.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-life and Health catastrophe risk [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to "Catastrophe Risk Charge before risk mitigation" minus "Estimated Risk Mitigation" added by "Estimated Reinstatement Premiums". -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.27.01; Rows: r3300;3310;3320;3330;3340;3350;3360;3370;3380;3390;3400;3410;3420;3430;3440;3450;3460;3470;3480;3490;3500;3510;3520;3530;3540;3550;3560;3570;3580;3590;3600; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0940,c0010}=Reported then {SR.27.01, rNNN,c1300}={SR.27.01, rNNN,c1270}-{SR.27.01, rNNN,c1280}+{SR.27.01, rNNN,c1290}

BV310_2: The item "Catastrophe Risk Charge after risk mitigation" reported in SR.27.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-life and Health catastrophe risk [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to "Catastrophe Risk Charge before risk mitigation" minus "Estimated Risk Mitigation" added by "Estimated Reinstatement Premiums". -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.27.01; Rows: r3300;3310;3320;3330;3340;3350;3360;3370;3380;3390;3400;3410;3420;3430;3440;3450;3460;3470;3480;3490;3500;3510;3520;3530;3540;3550;3560;3570;3580;3590;3600; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0940,c0010}=Reported then {SR.27.01, rNNN,c1300}={SR.27.01, rNNN,c1270}-{SR.27.01, rNNN,c1280}+{SR.27.01, rNNN,c1290}
